author: bencomic

right.text: You and every human past present and future WILL bow to him. Even the demons, angels, and Satan himself will bow to the Lord Jesus

left.text: Every knee will bow and every tounge confess that Jesus Christ is LORD. No matter what.
I almost feel like a sage now, even though I have so much to learn...

right.text: i've always wondered what it's like to be brainwashed.

title: XP XD XP XD XP XD part 1
